executiveSummary: Sample Remodeling has built a solid reputation through word-of-mouth, but your website isn't pulling its weight. We found critical gaps in lead capture, mobile experience, and local SEO that are costing you an estimated $100K+ in annual revenue. The good news: these are fixable, and fixing them puts you ahead of 90% of your competitors.

categories.name: First Impressions
issues: No clear headline ‚Äî visitors don't know what you do in 3 seconds
Stock photos instead of real project photos
CTA button buried below the fold
categories.benchmark: Top contractors have a clear value prop + quote form visible immediately

categories.name: Mobile Experience
issues: Menu doesn't collapse properly on mobile
Text too small to read without zooming
categories.benchmark: 60%+ of your visitors are on mobile. They should be able to call you in one tap.

categories.name: Trust & Credibility
issues: No Google reviews displayed on site
License and insurance info not visible
categories.benchmark: Homeowners check 3-5 contractors before calling. Reviews and photos win.

categories.name: Lead Capture
issues: No quote request form on homepage
Contact page requires too many fields
No sticky phone number on mobile
categories.benchmark: Best contractor sites have a form above the fold + click-to-call everywhere.

categories.name: SEO & Visibility
categories.benchmark: Local SEO = free leads forever. Service area pages rank for '[service] in [city]'.

competitors: Competitor A ranks #1 for 'Indianapolis kitchen remodeling' ‚Äî they have 12 service pages, you have 1
Competitor B has 85 Google reviews displayed on their site ‚Äî you have 0 shown
recommendations: Add a clear headline + quote form above the fold
Display your best Google reviews prominently
Make phone number click-to-call and sticky on mobile
Create service area pages for each city you serve
